LocaleLayout.title: Gabriela Cruz | software engineering and technology

HomePage.title: Gabriela Cruz | software engineering and technology
HomePage.hero: hi! i'm Gabi, a Software Engineer based in Rio de Janeiro.

About.title: About
About.text:
Graduated in Technical Informatics with a focus on Programming at CEFET/RJ, I discovered my passion for technology early on. During this period, I built a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and programming logic, working on my first projects.

Today, I study Computer Science at the University of Rio de Janeiro State, where I continue to strengthen this foundation while learning new things every day.

Currently, I work at the largest broadcaster in Latin America as a Mid-Level Software Developer, developing an integrated Pipeline for the content creation software used by Visual Effects designers.

The project involves tools in Python and Qt, aiming to optimize and streamline their daily workflow.
